71.description: The following form must be completed by the certified electrician who installed all electrical related components for the

72.description: pump-up system which was installed at:

73.description: This is to certify that the items marked as follows were carried out in the above installation:

75.description: Controls, floats, terminations in the tank are rated for location as per Section 22 of the Canadian Electrical Code,

76.description: Level control switches are provided for pump start, pump stop and high level alarm with water system shut down.

77.description: The pump stop level control switch is positioned above the pump to ensure that the pump is always kept cool

79.description: All electrical work was carried out under an electrical permit by a registered Class C electrical contractor (or higher)

81.description: The electrical components comply with the CSA 22.1-12. Control and junction boxes located outside the building

82.description: The warning light and audible alarm are placed in an appropriate location such that they can be readily seen and heard

83.description: The high level warning light and audible alarm are wired separately from the pump. If outside, the audible alarm can be

84.description: The high level control switch automatically shuts off the power to the water supply pump in the building.

85.description: The level control switches are supplied from a dedicated circuit separate from the pump circuit.
